common.premium_ex: Ready for a Premium Intercity Experience?

home.hero_subtitle: Experience luxury travel between Bishkek, Almaty, and beyond
home.about_text: We offer premier transportation services between Bishkek and Almaty, as well as throughout Kyrgyzstan. Our fleet consists of luxury vehicles operated by professional drivers to ensure your comfort and safety.
home.reason1_text: Modern vehicles from premium brands ensuring comfort and style
home.reason2_text: Experienced, courteous drivers who know the routes perfectly
home.reason3_text: Available any time of day or night for your convenience
home.reason4_text: Pickup and drop-off at your specified locations

vehicles.title: Our Premium Fleet
vehicles.subtitle: Select your preferred vehicle class
vehicles.sedan_text: Comfortable and efficient for individuals or small groups
vehicles.minivan_text: Spacious transport for groups up to 7 passengers
vehicles.suv_text: Premium comfort with enhanced road capabilities
vehicles.sprinter_text: Spacious transport for larger groups up to 18 passengers
